div.p: Click on any file below to view prior information releases regarding GASD Closure
Thank You to the Fireworks Committee for helping us recognize the Senior Class of 2020 and to Thank all of our front line responders to COVID-19.

div.small: Galeton Area School District, 27 Bridge Street, Galeton, PA 16922 - (814) 435-6571 - Fax: (814) 435-6981
The Galeton Area School District is an Equal Rights and Opportunities District with Title IX, Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973 and the American with Disabilities Act of 1990.
Equal Rights and Opportunities Director, Alanna R. Huck may be reached at (814) 435-6571
